items.content_html: A minimalistic code editor is a lightweight, distraction-free tool designed for efficient code writing. It offers essential features like syntax highlighting, code folding, and customization while prioritizing simplicity and performance.

items.content_html: This project is a crash course for Next.js 13 that demonstrates how to work on a simple project using the new app router and server components. It focuses on building a help desk application with CRUD operations on tickets. The project utilizes JSON Server as a lightweight database.
items.title: Tarraf2020/Crash-Course-for-Next.js-13---Net-Ninja: This project is a crash course for Next.js 13 that demonstrates how to work on a simple project using the new app router and server components. It focuses on building a help desk application with CRUD operations on tickets. The project utilizes JSON Server as a lightweight database.
